name: Autonomous?
description:
Autonomous? is a 3D walking simulator that seeks to exhibit the true nature of technology conglomerates and surveillance capitalism. While the game seems fun and silly in the beginning, players will stumble onto exhibits that detail technologyconglomerates intrusive use of personal data and the divisive state of the internet. By the end, players will ask themselves who's really in control?

Controls:

WASD: To Move

Space: To Jump

Shift: To Run

M: To Bring up Menu

B: To Backflip (When Standing Still)

Mouse: To Move Camera

Escape: To End Game

Gameplay Explanation and Meaning: https://drive.google.com/file/d/17Np3Ygl2PUyYtwFIgVCo0LqRGkwe_q6I/view?usp=shari...
